“我太累了”：努力去看专家加剧了河滨县妇女的痛苦特蕾莎·约翰逊无法摆脱痛苦。她的全身就像是一下子被针扎了一样。晚上，她有时会从睡梦中惊醒，以为臭虫正在攻击她。但这只是日复一日的持续不断的痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/e28098Ie28099m-so-burned-oute28099-Fighting-to-see-a-specialist-amplified-pain-for-Riverside-County-woman.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/e28098Ie28099m-so-burned-oute28099-Fighting-to-see-a-specialist-amplified-pain-for-Riverside-County-woman.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f57c9d8-aea2-45fa-965f-906a9aec1206 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 06:49:03 -0400 ‘I’m so burned out’: Fighting to see a specialist amplified pain for Riverside County woman
加州禁止有争议的“兴奋性谵妄”诊断加利福尼亚州是第一个禁止医生和法医将死亡归咎于“兴奋性谵妄”这一有争议的诊断的州，一位人权活动人士称赞这是一个“分水岭时刻”，可能会让警察更难为过度使用武力辩护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/California-bans-controversial-e28098excited-deliriume28099-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/California-bans-controversial-e28098excited-deliriume28099-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92d4e90f-97bc-4eed-986a-c42e18ca05c0 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 06:47:23 -0400 California bans controversial ‘excited delirium’ diagnosis
PrEP 作为一种重要的艾滋病毒预防工具，并未惠及黑人女性亚历克西斯·珀金斯 (Alexis Perkins) 认为她在亚特兰大的妇产科办公室正是获得降低感染艾滋病毒风险的药物处方的地方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/PrEP-a-key-HIV-prevention-tool-isne28099t-reaching-Black-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/PrEP-a-key-HIV-prevention-tool-isne28099t-reaching-Black-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c75030e-e6c2-4bfc-8152-f560e94715c5 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 06:45:38 -0400 PrEP, a key HIV prevention tool, isn’t reaching Black women
